The Quranic researcher calls a rebellion that he asks for, calls it and says: Oh, the attribute of it, so this is your time He enters it, and read the most seven and Omar bin Abd al -Aziz, Abu al -Shuhaâ€™at, al -Hasan, and al -Arjj: For his words, the transgression of hell, and the ritual of the people of al -Ashhab, and the external of the navigate, and the sons of Asim, the reckless, and a group on the authority of Abu Amr: A builder for the one who is alleged from the foundations of his saying: And we are inherent in Hell.
